name: Reversed Extinction
description:
THIS IS THE WORLD IN 2078, HUMANS DO

ARBITRARILY, LITTERING, DEFORESTING,
HUNTING FOR ENDANGERED ANIMALS, AND BECAUSE
OF THIS, GLOBAL WARMING CONTINUES TO
INCREASE, ANIMALS LOSE THEIR HABITAT AND
ARE INCREASINGLY DIFFICULT TO SURVIVE.
BECAUSE IT HAS BEEN IN THIS CONDITION FOR
TOO LONG, ANIMALS HAVE BEGUN TO EVOLVE SO
THAT THEY ARE NOT EXTINCT, AND BEGIN TO TRY
TO STOP THE SOURCE OF THEIR SUFFERING,
"HUMANS". HUMANS BEGIN TO REALIZE THEIR
MISTAKES, BUT IT'S TOO LATE FOR THEM. THE
REMAINING HUMANS BEGAN TO GATHER TO FIND
NEW SETTLEMENTS FOR THEM.
WOULD THEY SUCCEED?
